A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was the most disappointing movie I have ever seen. It was like it was written by a 7 year old. No plot\, no details\, weak fight scenes...Snoke who can apparently move a person with a wink was unable to see his light saber coming into his side. And Kylo who can read people's minds couldn't figure out that he was fighting a hologram at the end of the movie. You never find out about the Knights of Ren and who cares...Ren is the worst villain I've ever seen and I mean ever. And Luke\, OMG\, the jedi that brought down Dart Sidious and helped restore balance to the galaxy dies at the end of a heart attack from his exhaustion as a hologram. The entire movie felt like a SNL skit. I was waiting for Andy Kaufman to pop out at the end of the movie and say\, \"Gotcha...\" DO NOT go see this movie unless you want incredible disappointment. Honestly\, I enjoyed watching Disney's Moana better than this. What just happened?
